ARABIC: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Pharaoh pursued them with his troops and the sea overwhelmed them utterly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then the Pharaoh followed them with his army, but the sea overpowered and engulfed them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh pursued them with his hosts, but they were fully overwhelmed by the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh and his army chased Moses and his people but were drowned by the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So Firaun went after them with his army – therefore the sea enveloped them, the way it did.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then Fir`awn pursued them with his hosts, but the sea [Al-Yamm] completely overwhelmed them and covered them up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Firon followed them with his armies, so there came upon them of the sea that which came upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Pharaoh followed them with his hosts, but they were overwhelmed by the sea;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then Pharaoh followed them with his hosts and there covered them that which did cover them of the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh pursued them with his hosts, but they were submerged by the sea, which was destined to overwhelm them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then Fir'awn followed them with his hosts; and there came upon them of the sea that which came upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then Pharaoh pursued them with his troops, whereat they were engulfed by what engulfed them of the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then Pharaoh pursued them with his forces, but the waters completely overwhelmed them and covered them up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then Fir'aun (Pharaoh) pursued them with his hosts, but the sea-water completely overwhelmed them and covered them up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Pharaoh pursued them with his legions so they were overwhelmed from the sea with that which drowned them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Pharaoh pursued them with his troops, but the sea overwhelmed them, and completely engulfed them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:78] Then Pharaoh pursued them with his hosts, with him [Pharaoh] alongside them, and there engulfed them what did engulf them of the sea, and it drowned them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then Pharaoh followed with his hosts and there covered them that which did cover them of the sea) they drowned in the sea.
